message: Let's start with a generous offer. Accept and we can end the game early!
Not bad, but I can do better than that!
I'm willing to compromise. Accept and we can move on.
I'm starting to get a bit more aggressive...
I'm willing to give you a bit more, but I'm not getting desperate yet.
You're not giving me enough, Alice. I'm starting to think I'm the one who's desperate!
I'm trying to find a compromise, but I'm not going to give up easily. Take it or leave it.
I'm taking a firmer stance now. You're going to have to give me more if you want to get anything!
I'm trying to be realistic about the situation. I'll give you a bit more, but I'm not going to give up everything.
I'm not going to back down now. You're going to have to give me most of it if you want to get anything!
I'm running out of options. This is my last chance to get a decent share.
You've left me no choice. Take it or leave it, I'm not negotiating further!
